Sentencas: Cerium oxide (CeO2) nanoparticles have been synthesized through composite-hydroxide-mediated approach.
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles

Sentencas: The X-ray powder diffraction (XRD) measurement proved that the pure cubic CeO2 could be obtained at a low temperature region (170-220 degrees C).
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles

Sentencas: The particle size, micrograph morphology and microstructure were investigated by transmission electron microscope (TEM) and environmental scanning electron microscope (ESEM).
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles

Sentencas: The conductivity of as-synthesized CeO2 was measured by a standard four-probe method.
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles

Sentencas: The conductivity of CeO2 increases slightly with the increase of temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles

Sentencas: And the conductivity increases rapidly to 0.02418 s cm(-1) at 830 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles

Sentencas: The product is a potential material for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (ITSOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and conductivity of cerium oxide nanoparticles
